example.text: Mr. President, the southern border has already been in a state of chaos for over two years under your leadership. We need immediate action to stem this security, fentanyl, and humanitarian crisis. [[url]]

45 million Americans tune into AM radio each month to receive emergency alerts, weather updates & more. [[user]] & I are leading 100 bipartisan Members of Congress requesting answers about AM radio being removed from current & future vehicles. [[url]]

It’s crucial America stays at the forefront of AV innovation. Passing a federal AV framework will allow us to ensure we maintain US leadership in vehicle technology. Honored to accept [[user]]’s AV Champion Award alongside my AV Caucus co-chair [[user]]. [[url]]

“Allowing one of our greatest adversaries to snatch up farmland is a dangerous trend that not only has national security implications but threatens the security of our food supply and harms American agriculture producers. I’m proud to join Congressman Newhouse in this effort to keep China from purchasing valuable American land, undercutting our farmers, and gaining a foothold from within our own nation.” “The Chinese Communist Party (CCP) is a threat to American democracy.

This is the reality of the #bordercrisis. While we thank our border patrol agents for their hard work, they need support. Congress must take action to secure our borders to stop the flow of deadly substances & criminals. [[url]]

That's why I helped lead the Protecting America's Strategic Petroleum Reserve from China Act - passed by the US House - to prevent the Secretary of Energy from selling any products from the SPR to any entity owned or under the control or influence of the Chinese Communist Party. We're also taking steps to ensure a plan is put in place to replenish our SPR.

It’s crucial America stays at the forefront of AV innovation. Passing a federal AV framework will allow us to ensure we maintain US leadership in vehicle technology. Honored to accept [[user]]’s AV Champion Award alongside my AV Caucus co-chair [[user]]. [[url]]
